Docs.summary: Gets or sets the number of seconds to wait before terminating the attempt to execute the command. Defaults to 30. A value of 0 means no timeout.
Docs.value: The number of seconds to wait before terminating the attempt to execute the command.
Docs.remarks: The timeout is used when the command is waiting to obtain a lock on the table.
